name: The Count of Schwarzburg
description:
It's a retro adventure RPG game with a mixture of sprite based and 3d graphics. Made for the Unreal Engine 2019 summer Game Jam in about a week.

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move, Page Up/Down for moving camera up and down. Mouse for the rest of it. 

Note: The second group of bandits to the left of the castle gate gets bugged some of the time and locks the game. It's best to avoid that battle.
